content.rendered:
Incidents and service interruptions

CYPRESS INCIDENT

By using a URL that was specially crafted, a third party could have redirected people who were accessing GC Notify to a site that is not GC Notify. We discovered this security issue on September 9, 2023 and we fixed it on September 10, 2023.

You were not impacted if you accessed the URL using the address bar or bookmarks. For details about the issue, read the security advisory on GitHub.

August 2, 2023: Email degradation

Update: This incident is now resolved.

Our system is experiencing some degradation for emails at the moment and our team is investigating.

May 31, 2023: Security measure

All users must change their password:

  • GC Notify’s security is not compromised.
  • This precaution is due to a security breach at Lastpass, a service used by GC Notify. We do not store user passwords in Lastpass.
  • For details about the breach, read the Lastpass blog post.

To learn about GC Notify’s security practices, visit our Security statement.
